name: Superhuman
tagline: AI-first email client for fast, focused communication
description: Superhuman is an AI-first email client that accelerates communication with smart triage, shortcuts, and AI-assisted replies.

name: Grammarly
tagline: AI writing assistant for grammar, tone, and clarity
description: Grammarly uses AI to help you write clearly and confidently with grammar, tone, and clarity suggestions across apps.

name: Jasper
tagline: AI content platform for marketing teams
description: Jasper helps marketing and content teams generate on-brand copy for blogs, ads, and campaigns at scale.

name: Notion AI
tagline: AI assistant embedded in Notion docs and wikis
description: Notion AI helps you write, summarize, translate, and improve your notes and docs inside Notion.

name: Compose AI
tagline: AI autocomplete for faster writing in the browser
description: Compose AI is a browser-based AI autocomplete that helps you write emails and documents faster.

name: HyperWrite
tagline: Personal AI writing assistant and task helper
description: HyperWrite provides AI suggestions, auto-complete, and task assistance directly in the browser.

name: Quillbot
tagline: AI paraphraser and writing improver
description: Quillbot helps rewrite, paraphrase, and summarize text for clearer communication and academic writing.

name: Wordtune
tagline: Rewrite and improve sentences with AI
description: Wordtune is an AI writing assistant that suggests alternative phrasings to improve clarity and tone.

name: Otter.ai
tagline: AI meeting assistant for transcription and notes
description: Otter.ai automatically records, transcribes, and summarizes meetings so teams can focus on the discussion.

name: Fireflies.ai
tagline: Record, transcribe, and search your meetings
description: Fireflies.ai joins your meetings, records them, and creates searchable transcripts and summaries.

name: Fathom
tagline: Free AI meeting assistant for Zoom calls
description: Fathom records Zoom calls and generates highlights, transcripts, and summaries for your meetings.

name: tl;dv
tagline: Record and summarize Google Meet and Zoom meetings
description: tl;dv records and transcribes meetings, adding AI summaries and searchable highlights.

name: Motion
tagline: AI time management that auto-schedules tasks and meetings
description: Motion automatically builds an optimized schedule for your day by prioritizing tasks and meetings.

name: Reclaim AI
tagline: Smart calendar assistant for habits and tasks
description: Reclaim AI automatically blocks time on your calendar for your habits, tasks, and meetings.

name: Sunsama
tagline: Daily planner that integrates tasks, email, and calendar
description: Sunsama is a daily planner that brings tasks, email, and calendar together with AI assistance for focus.

name: Akiflow
tagline: Time blocking and task management with AI
description: Akiflow combines time blocking, calendar, and task management with AI suggestions and shortcuts.

name: Perplexity
tagline: AI-powered answer engine for research with citations
description: Perplexity is an AI answer engine that retrieves information from the web and provides cited answers.

name: Elicit
tagline: AI research assistant for academic papers
description: Elicit uses language models to help with literature reviews and research workflows across academic papers.

name: SciSpace
tagline: AI copilot for understanding research papers
description: SciSpace helps you read, explain, and ask questions about scientific papers with AI.

name: Zapier
tagline: Workflow automation platform with AI steps
description: Zapier automates workflows between SaaS tools and includes AI actions to transform and route data.

name: Make
tagline: Visual automation platform with AI integrations
description: Make (formerly Integromat) is a visual automation platform that connects apps and AI services.

name: Bardeen
tagline: Browser automation with AI for repetitive workflows
description: Bardeen lets you automate repetitive browser tasks, with AI to generate and adapt automation playbooks.

name: ChatGPT
tagline: General-purpose AI assistant with strong coding support
description: ChatGPT is a general-purpose AI assistant that can generate, explain, and refactor code in many languages.

name: Claude
tagline: Anthropic's AI assistant with long context and coding
description: Claude is an AI assistant from Anthropic with strong reasoning, long context, and coding capabilities.

name: Gemini
tagline: Google's AI assistant with search and coding
description: Gemini is Google's AI assistant that can answer questions, write, and help with code.

name: DeepSeek Coder
tagline: Open-source code model for generation and completion
description: DeepSeek Coder is a code-focused language model that can generate and complete code in multiple languages.

name: Codeium
tagline: Free AI code completion for multiple IDEs
description: Codeium is a free AI code completion tool that integrates with many IDEs and editors.

name: GitHub Copilot
tagline: AI pair programmer embedded in your IDE
description: GitHub Copilot suggests whole lines and functions in your editor, acting as an AI pair programmer.

name: Cursor
tagline: AI-native code editor built on VS Code
description: Cursor is an AI-native code editor that brings code generation, refactoring, and chat directly into your IDE.

name: Windsurf
tagline: AI code editor focused on deep context and navigation
description: Windsurf is an AI code editor that uses long context and intelligent navigation for large codebases.

name: Antigravity
tagline: AI-first IDE focused on autonomous coding workflows
description: Antigravity is an AI-first IDE designed around autonomous agents and iterative coding workflows.

name: Sourcegraph Cody
tagline: AI code search and assistant for large repos
description: Sourcegraph Cody helps you search and understand large repositories with AI assistance.

name: Continue.dev
tagline: Open-source coding copilot inside your editor
description: Continue.dev is an open-source coding copilot that lives in your editor and uses local or remote LLMs.

name: DeepCode (Snyk Code)
tagline: AI-powered code review and security scanning
description: DeepCode, now part of Snyk Code, uses AI to detect security issues and bugs in your code.

name: CodeRabbit

name: Midjourney

description: Midjourney is an AI image generator that produces detailed visuals and art from text prompts via Discord.

name: DALL·E

name: Adobe Firefly

description: Adobe Firefly brings generative image creation and text effects into Adobe tools like Photoshop and Express.

name: DreamStudio (Stability AI)

description: DreamStudio is Stability AI's web interface for generating images with Stable Diffusion models.

description: Descript lets you edit audio and video like a doc, with transcription, overdub, and AI effects.

name: Synthesia

name: Copy.ai

description: Copy.ai helps marketers write ads, social posts, and blog content faster with AI templates.

name: Writesonic

name: AutoGPT
tagline: Experimental autonomous agent that decomposes goals into tasks
description: AutoGPT is an experimental agent framework that chains LLM calls to autonomously break down and execute goals.

name: AgentGPT

description: AgentGPT lets you configure and run autonomous AI agents directly in the browser for various tasks.

name: Taskade AI Agents

tagline: AI engineer that fixes bugs and maintains codebases
description: Sweep AI automatically fixes issues and maintains codebases by operating on GitHub repositories.

name: Aider

name: Adept ACT-1

name: LangChain

description: LangChain is a popular framework for building LLM-powered applications, including tools and multi-step agents.

name: Mem
tagline: AI-powered workspace that organizes notes automatically
description: Mem is an AI workspace that automatically organizes notes, tasks, and knowledge around people and projects.

name: Reflect
tagline: Networked note-taking with built-in AI assistance
description: Reflect is a networked note-taking app that uses AI to help you recall and connect ideas over time.

name: Centered

description: Centered uses an AI coach, timers, and music to guide you through focused work sessions.

name: Tana

name: Readwise Reader

description: Readwise Reader lets you save articles, PDFs, and feeds, then uses AI to summarize and resurface key ideas.

name: Glasp

description: Glasp is a social highlighting extension that lets you save quotes, organize them, and use AI to summarize pages.

description: Tactiq is a Chrome extension that captures transcripts and AI summaries from Zoom, Meet, and Teams calls.

name: Merlin
tagline: Universal browser AI assistant on any page

name: Monica

description: Monica is an AI copilot extension that helps with writing, translation, and research directly in the browser.

name: LINER

description: Figma AI helps designers accelerate workflows with generated content, layout suggestions, and quick edits.
